reviewText: Happy with my purchase thank you
I adore this series and Berrykins was a favorite growing up. Really wish this and the rest were in a DVD compilation.

As a kid,I remember watching this movie over and over again with my Mom! I love this movie,and the song"I want to be who I am when I grow up is awesome. I love the way Strawberry and her girls dance to the music.and when she gets her wish of long hair its magical! Our kids need this kind of entertainment today! I cant wait.till they put this out on DVD so I can share it with my kids one day!
This was one of my favorite movies as a kid. But I don't even own a VHS player anymore. I sure hope they start selling it on DVD soon! My daughters would love it!

I love this movie form Strawberry Shortcake it is by far my absolute favorite!!  It has the "Peculiar Purple Pie Man of Porcupine Peak" and "Sour Grapes" together as the villians.  And a new array of good guys are introduced too!!  I really hope they put this one on DVD soon, I miss it so!!
